api_header_message.message: Hello Reddit! This request was made by the AlienTube Browser Extension (http://alientube.co/) If you have noticed unusual or overloading traffic here, you can contact the developer at alex@sorlie.co.uk
api_header_message.description: Message that is sent with every request to Reddit so they can identify our requests and potentially contact us should any issues arise

timestamp_format_year.description: Singular form of the date unit 'Year' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_year_plural.description: Plural form of the date unit 'Year' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_month.description: Singular form of the date unit 'Month' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_month_plural.description: Plural form of the date unit 'Month' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_day.description: Singular form of the date unit 'Day' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_day_plural.description: Plural form of of the date unit 'Day' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_hour.description: Singular form of the time unit 'Hour' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_hour_plural.description: Plural form of the time unit 'Hour' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_minute.description: Singular form of the time unit 'Minute' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_minute_plural.description: Plural form of the time unit 'Minute' for timestamps.

timestamp_format_second.description: Singular form of the time unit 'Second' for timestamps

timestamp_format_second_plural.description: Plural form of the time unit 'Second' for timestamps.

post_submitted_timestamp_text.description: Prefix describing that the following time description will say when the post was submitted

post_submitted_preposition.description: Prefix preposition describing that the following will be the author of this post

post_current_score.description: Singular form describing that the previous number was the score of this post (points)

post_current_score_plural.description: Plural form describing that the previous number was the score of this post (points)

post_button_refresh.description: This button will cause the post to be reloaded/refreshed.

post_button_gold.description: This button will open up a donation window for the reddit gold membership feature to another user for this submission

post_button_comment.description: This button will open up a comment field to write in

post_button_source.description: This button will display the original markdown source code that was used to create this post

post_button_save.description: This button will save this post to your list

post_button_unsave.description: This button will remove this post from your list of saved posts

post_button_report.description: This button will open up a report dialog to report this user/post for terms of service violations or illegal activity

post_button_edit.description: This button will open up an edit post box for the user.

post_button_delete.description: This button will delete the selected post

post_button_reply.description: This button will open up a reply field to write a comment reply in.

post_button_comments.description: Button for switching between the comment section of Reddit and Google+

post_button_permalink.description: This button will open up this post on reddit.com in a new window

post_button_parent.description: This button will open up the post this post is a reply to, in a new window

post_button_load_more.description: This button will load more comments under this post

post_badge_NSFW.description: Badge text indicating that the content of this post is inappropriate/adult.

post_badge_NSFW_message.message: Adult content: Not Safe for Work
post_badge_NSFW_message.description: Longer message that displays on hover, explaining the badge.

post_label_reply.description: Singular label describing how many replies this comment has

post_label_reply_plural.description: Plural label describing how many replies this comment has

post_label_noresults.description: Label describing that there were no results found

post_delete_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
post_delete_confirm.description: Message asking the user whether they really want to delete this post.

post_message_official.message: This is the official discussion for this video
post_message_official.description: Message explaining to the user that this reddit thread is official, that is promoted or endorsed by the author

report_dialog_spam.description: This user has been spamming (posted excessive advertisments without permission)

report_dialog_vote_manipulation.description: This user has been attempting to trick Reddit to give them more votes than people has actually given them

report_dialog_personal_information.description: This user has been leaking out other peoples personal information on Reddit

report_dialog_seuxalising_minors.description: This user has been posting child pornography or related materials to Reddit

report_dialog_breaking_reddit.description: This person has intentionally caused features or the layout of Reddit to break or misbehave

report_dialog_other.description: This user has done something else that should be reported, you can maximum type 100 characters in here

loading_generic_message.description: Generic loading message to indicate to the user that content is being downloaded from Reddit

loading_generic_text.message: It's a thing in progress, respect the thing!
loading_generic_text.description: Generic loading message, a joke Doctor Who reference.

loading_search_message.description: Message indicating that AlienTube is currently searching for Reddit posts that have linked to this video

loading_post_message.description: Message indicating that AlienTube is loading a specific post from Reddit

loading_slow_message.message: This is taking longer than usual..
loading_slow_message.description: Message indicating that the download process is taking unusually long

loading_retry_message.description: Message indicating that the download has failed once and we are automatically retrying for the Nth time.

error_header_not_found.description: Title for error describing that an attempt to load something failed because it went somewhere that does not exist (404)

error_message_not_found.message: the page you requested does not exist
error_message_not_found.description: Message for error describing that an attempt to load something failed because it went somewhere that does not exist (404)

error_header_overloaded.message: reddit is under heavy load right now
error_header_overloaded.description: Title for error describing that comments failed to load because Reddit is too overloaded and couldn't give us what we wanted

error_message_overloaded.message: please try again in a few minutes
error_message_overloaded.description: Message describing that the user should wait a few minutes before trying again to give Reddi time to recover

error_header_timeout.description: Title for error describing that comments failed because the connection timed out

error_message_timeout.message: The connection to Reddit timed out, please check your internet connection, browser settings, firewall, and browser extensions
error_message_timeout.description: Message for error describing that comments failed because the connection timed out

error_header_interrupted.description: Title for error describing that comments failed because the connection was interrupted by something

error_message_interrupted.message: Something is interrupting the connection to reddit.com and we cannot proceed, if you use software or browser extensions to filter Internet traffic like Disconnect.me you may need to whitelist Reddit.
error_message_interrupted.description: Message for error describing that comments failed because the connection was interrupted by something

error_header_generic.description: Message describing that Reddit experienced an error, with humoristic implications jokingly implying that it is the user's fault.

error_button_retry.description: Button for attempting to load the comments again.

commentfield_button_submit.description: Button for submitting the comment to Reddit

commentfield_button_cancel.description: Button for cancelling your comment and hiding the comment box

commentfield_label_preview.description: Label indicating that this panel shows a preview of how your text will look when it is posted

commentfield_label_author.description: Label under the comment field indicating who your comment will be submitted as.

options_label_hiddenPostScoreThreshold.message: Do not display posts with a score less than:
options_label_hiddenPostScoreThreshold.description: If the score for this Reddit post is less than the input, it will not be shown in the list

options_label_hiddenCommentScoreThreshol.message: Do not display comments with a score less than:
options_label_hiddenCommentScoreThreshol.description: If the score for this comment is less than the input, it will not be shown in the comment section

options_label_showGooglePlusWhenNoPosts.message: Display Google+ comments if no Reddit comments are found
options_label_showGooglePlusWhenNoPosts.description: Show the Google+ comments like usual if there are no Reddit comments to see

options_label_showGooglePlusButton.description: This option will toggle the visibility of the Google+ comments button.

options_label_defaultDisplayAction.description: This option will set whether AlienTube or Google+ is shown by default.

options_label_reset.description: Button to reset all settings to their factory default.

options_label_hide_following.description: Message explaining to the user that the list below is of subreddits that will not be shown

options_label_gplus.description: Google+ option for the default display option

options_label_alientube.description: AlienTube option for the default display option

options_label_showReddit.message: Show Reddit comments on this channel
options_label_showReddit.description: AlienTube option on wheter to show Reddit comments by default on this channel
